caption.p: Measured vs. predicted heights of probands. Based on 300 randomly selected individuals from the United Kingdom Biobank trio data not included in predictor training in the PRS++ model (A), the PRS++ model without parental information (B), FHS using the PRS++ model fitted from United Kingdom Biobank data (C), and FHS using the PRS++ model without parental information fitted from United Kingdom Biobank data (D). The gray lines represent a 95% prediction interval.
